Subject: CAP Printing Monitoring Problem
Description: We are currently using the Device Control module, where we should be able to see an event for the file that has been printed, however we tried the file tracing feature and no results were found, if you could please guide as through the process to fix this. (Server version may be subject to change).
What_We_Know__c:
18 April

- check if the MTP Advanced Scanning and Printing is enabled under Global Settings. If not, please activate it, Save and then restart the PC as this feature requires a service restart in order to work.
Next_Steps__c:
18 April 
- waiting for the customer to check if the MTP Advanced Scanning and Printing is enabled under Global Settings.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer confirmed that the issue is solved after enabling the MTP Advanced Scanning and Printing is enabled under Global Settings.
